shaylan.shapes

Class Shape

  • java.lang.Object
    • shaylan.shapes.Shape
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Circle, Line, Rectangle, RegularPolygon

    public abstract class Shape
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a Processing-drawable ambiguous Shape as a super class for more specific shapes
    Author:
    shaylandias

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected double x
      The x-coordinate value of this Shape
      protected double y
      The y-coordinate value of this Shape

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Shape(double x, double y)
      Creates a default instance of a Shape object with all dimensions set to zero, fillWeight 1, and stroke and fill colors black
      Shape(double x, double y, double strokeWeight, java.awt.Color strokeColor, java.awt.Color fillColor)
      Creates a new instance of a Shape object with the upper left corner of the Shape at x,y and with width and height

    • Constructor Detail

      • Shape

        public Shape(double x,
             double y)
        Creates a default instance of a Shape object with all dimensions set to zero, fillWeight 1, and stroke and fill colors black
        Parameters:
        x - the x-value for this Shape's coordinate
        y - the y-value for this Shape's coordinate

      • Shape

        public Shape(double x,
             double y,
             double strokeWeight,
             java.awt.Color strokeColor,
             java.awt.Color fillColor)
        Creates a new instance of a Shape object with the upper left corner of the Shape at x,y and with width and height
        Parameters:
        x - The upper left x-coordinate of the Shape
        y - The upper-left y-coordinate of the Shape
        strokeWeight - The Processing strokeWeight when drawing this Shape
        strokeColor - The Processing strokeColor when drawing this Shape
        fillColor - The Processing fillColor when drawing this Shape

    • Method Detail

      • draw

        public void draw(processing.core.PApplet drawer)
        Sets the stroke, fill, and strokeWeight of the drawer to the Shape's values
        Parameters:
        drawer - The PApplet to draw to
        Precondition:
        The drawer must not be null. All modifications to marker besides rectMode will apply to the Shape

      • drawNoFill

        public void drawNoFill(processing.core.PApplet drawer)
        Sets the stroke and strokeWeight of the drawer to the Shape's values and sets the drawer to noFill()
        Parameters:
        drawer - The PApplet to draw to
        Precondition:
        The drawer must not be null. All modifications to marker besides rectMode will apply to the Shape

      • isPointInside

        public abstract boolean isPointInside(double x,
                                      double y)
        Returns true if the input point is contained by the Shape
        Parameters:
        x - The x-value of the point
        y - The y-value of the point
        Returns:
        True if the Point x,y is inside the Shape
